label: A7B2C_cP40_205_ad_c_b-001
title: ZrP$_{2}$O$_{7}$ ($K6_{1}$) High-Temperature Structure
comments: This is the high temperature form of all the structures listed.  The low temperature structure depends on the composition.  Below 290$^{\circ}$C ZrP$_{2}$O$_{7}$ transforms to an orthorhombic structure, space group $Pbca$ \#61, with 136 unique crystallographic positions and 1080 atomic sites.  See (Birkedal, 2006) and (Stinton, 2006) for more details.
